steps.uploadText: Choose or drag & drop your image

backgroundRemoverPage.heroDescription: Remove backgrounds from your images using advanced AI technology. Choose the best model for your use case and get clean cut-outs ready to use.

imageEnhancementPage.heroDescription: Enhance your images with AI-powered brightness, contrast, saturation, and sharpness adjustments. Use auto-enhance for one-click optimization or fine-tune each parameter manually.

smartCropPage.heroDescription: Precisely crop and resize your images with manual control or AI-powered auto-detection. Select custom dimensions, choose aspect ratios, or let AI find the perfect crop.

info.autoDetectDescription: Let AI automatically detect faces and important areas for optimal cropping
info.aspectDescription: Choose from popular presets like 16:9, 4:3, 1:1, or use custom dimensions
info.controlDescription: Fine-tune width and height with precision sliders for pixel-perfect results
info.qualityDescription: Advanced algorithms preserve image quality during crop and resize operations
